name: Daniel L. STEVENSON, Admr. of the Estate of Daniel L. Stevenson, Jr., Deceased, and the Estate of Delcita M. Stevenson, Deceased, Virginia A. Stevenson and Valerie Stevenson, a minor by Daniel L. Stevenson, her parent and natural guardian, Petitioners, v. GENERAL MOTORS CORPORATION

parties: Daniel L. STEVENSON, Admr. of the Estate of Daniel L. Stevenson, Jr., Deceased, and the Estate of Delcita M. Stevenson, Deceased, Virginia A. Stevenson and Valerie Stevenson, a minor by Daniel L. Stevenson, her parent and natural guardian, Petitioners, v. GENERAL MOTORS CORPORATION.

opinions.text: Petition for Allowance of Appeal GRANTED, No. 17 E.D. Appeal Docket 1986.

casebody.head_matter:
505 A. 2d 251
Daniel L. STEVENSON, Admr. of the Estate of Daniel L. Stevenson, Jr., Deceased, and the Estate of Delcita M. Stevenson, Deceased, Virginia A. Stevenson and Valerie Stevenson, a minor by Daniel L. Stevenson, her parent and natural guardian, Petitioners, v. GENERAL MOTORS CORPORATION.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Feb. 3, 1986.
